body: Vershiy Geraldine Njeta aka Vershiy is a gospel artist with a style of her own. the 28-year-old singer with a degree in Law, Vershiy has always dedicated her talent to God.
summary:
Vershiy Geraldine Njeta aka Vershiy is a gospel artist with a style of her own. the 28-year-old singer with a degree in Law, Vershiy has always dedicated her talent to God. 

She loves dancing, singing, travelling and reading. Newly signed under the record label; Ablaze Music, Vershiy is yet to unravel her unthinkable gift to the world. 

Her genre is uncommon, yet it is going to make a buzz in the market. Although her mission is to spread the word of God to the ends of the world, Vershiy comes forth with a deep level of professionalism and a lot of grandeur from her team. 

With vershiy around, get your ears ready for Afro-pop with traditional Gospel music. 
 
"I am the last child of 4, and a lover of GOD so love everything that concerns him.
I choose Gospel because I know it's the will of GOD for me to serve him, and I feel more Comfortable doing his will than mine." Says Vershiy 

under the mentorship of pastor Camile and the management of Ablaze tv, vershiy will indeed be a force to reckon with.
author: dIyA2l79NifO81mlNIh6t

label: Ablaze Music
